Articles.Content:
I suppose I may as well introduce myself here, since I've posted in a bug thread already.

Hey, I'm Astra. I've been playing KSP since Alpha 0.18 and having a blast with it ever since. KSP got me into realistic spaceflight and completely changed the way that I look at science fiction, which is a sentiment I often see on the internet. As a writer I've appreciated how it's helped me to grow, and as a player I've loved having a sandbox to play around with realistic spaceflight principles and the sheer breadth of options available with modding. I almost never play stock these days and have been intending for years now to do a full career playthrough of Near Future and Far Future technologies.

I may be around more often now that I've introduced myself, though I am a chronic lurker, so I may continue to do so into the future. Regardless, introducing myself seemed prudent.
Welcome to the forum @Astra Anima!
Hi @Astra Anima!

Welcome aboard!

Happy to have you here
